pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation of Recurrent Event Data for Non-Constant Baseline Hazard // Simulation of recurrent event data for non-constant baseline hazard in the total time model with risk-free intervals and possibly a competing event. Possibility to cut the data to an interim data set. Data can be plotted. Details about the method can be found in Jahn-Eimermacher, A. et al. (2015) doi:10.1186/s12874-015-0005-2.
